hero.name: Pablo Alcalde
hero.description: Developer specialized in Vue.js and Nuxt.js, with a passion for creating intuitive and SEO-optimized interfaces. Currently working at

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: I'm Pablo, I'm 21 years old and I'm a front-end developer passionate about creating exceptional web experiences. I specialize in Vue.js and Nuxt.js, and I have solid experience in SEO optimization.
about.paragraph2: Programming and front-end development are my true passion. I love creating intuitive and visually appealing interfaces that provide an excellent user experience.
about.paragraph3: I'm always motivated to learn new technologies and frameworks that allow me to take my projects to the next level. Seeing a design come to life through code is something that always inspires me and challenges me to keep improving.

experience.title: Experience
experience.description: Developer at Wegow, migrating applications from Vue.js to Nuxt.js and optimizing SEO to improve positioning.

education.title: Education
education.description: Higher Technician in Multi-platform Application Development + Master's in SEO and Web Positioning.

methodologies.title: Methodologies
methodologies.description: Experience in SCRUM, working with tools like Jira, Taiga, Git and Slack in agile teams.

learning.title: Continuous Learning
learning.description: Committed to constant learning through online courses on new technologies and best practices.

projects.title: My
projects.subtitle: Real projects developed for clients, focused on performance, SEO and exceptional user experience.

cta.title: Do you have a project in mind?
cta.description: I'm available for new projects. Let's work together to create something amazing that stands out in the market.

blog.title: Blog &
blog.subtitle: Sharing knowledge about frontend development, SEO and the latest web technologies
blog.noResults: No articles found for this category.

contact.title: Let's talk about your
contact.subtitle: Do you have a project in mind or want to collaborate? Feel free to contact me. I'm always open to new opportunities and interesting conversations.
